text: Software engineer with experience building backend APIs, data pipelines, and cloud-deployed systems.
Built and maintained distributed data pipelines in Python processing ~2M events/day.
Deployed microservices to AWS using Docker and Kubernetes; reduced deployment time by 35%.
Implemented CI/CD workflows using GitHub Actions and Terraform for environment provisioning.
Designed REST APIs in Go and optimized query performance on PostgreSQL.
Created internal monitoring dashboards using Prometheus and Grafana.
Improved API latency by 18% by refactoring caching and batching logic.
Developed a CLI tool in Python to manage container rollout strategies across Kubernetes clusters.
Implemented automated rollback, traffic shifting, and live readiness probes.
